content_html:
Kathmandu Mayor Balen Shah attempted to cheer up Dharan Sub-Metropolitan City Mayor Hark Sampang through social media. This happened after Hark Sampang posted an angry comment targeting Balen on the same platform.

A Declaration of One-Sided Love
content_text: Kathmandu Mayor Balen Shah attempted to cheer up Dharan Sub-Metropolitan City Mayor Hark Sampang through social media. This happened after Hark Sampang posted an angry comment targeting Balen on the same platform. A Declaration of One-Sided Love
summary:

title: Mayor Balen's Playful Message to an Angry Hark Sampang
